bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Alternative Names shao yang bing 少陽病 , minor yang disease. Pathological Condition in the course of harm caused by cold where evil affects the minor yang blocking the pivotal qi dynamics and the conduit qi, with alternating sensations of cold and heat, a feeling of fullness in the chest and flanks, a bitter taste in the mouth, a dry throat, dizzy eyes, and a string-like, fine movement in the vessels as frequent signs. Shang han lun 傷寒論 5: 傷寒二三日，陽明、少陽證不見者，為不傳也 , “If after harm caused by cold has lasted for two to three days no yang brilliance and no minor yang pathological conditions are visible, then it has not been transmitted further”.
